featured_prop.Directions: Washington Street gate: Rancho LQ Drive to Mission Drive West - turn right...to Via Carmel - turn left. Property on the right at end of cul-de-sac.
featured_prop.Remarks: AVAILABLE March and April 2016! SOUTH and east views of Santa Rosa Mountains & amazing views of lakes, the 1st & 18th fairways of the Jones course & the spectacular waterfall at signature 18th green! Fantastic 1/2 acre estate with salt water POOL/SPA, BBQ, Misters and more! Sleeps 8 in four ensuite bedrooms. Upgraded to perfection with the finest of finishes & materials...intricately crafted walnut & zebra wood built-ins, inlaid doors & faux painted cabinetry. Bamboo accents, vibrant paint finishes & hand-made wall & ceiling coverings, upgraded designer lighting. State-of-the art kitchen has commercial grade appliances & rich granite surfaces & backsplash. Deluxe detached guest casita sits far away from the home. It boasts a fireplace, bar service area, great lake & golf course views. Wi-Fi Internet & Phone (unlimited calls USA/Canada). Bedrooms: Master is King, other two bedrooms in main house are Kings, bed in Casita is Queen. RLQCC Rules re festival months - Call us for details.

featured_prop.Directions: Enter at front gate on Fred Waring. Turn right on Parkway Esplande S, Left on Bordeaux, Right on Calle Espada, right on Corte Nuevo. House at end of cul-de-sac.
featured_prop.Remarks: Available April for Coachella fests. Live the season in this newly designed lush landscaped south west lot with new private salt water 40 foot pool/9 foot tanning ledge/spa for 8/water feature/huge BBQ & rectangle fire pit. Large 5 bedroom & 4 bath home which could accommodate 10 guests with 2 Kings,2 Queens & new queen sofa bed. 7 flat screen TV including TVs in each bedroom, great room and kitchen. The 3356 square foot home features an open flowing floor plan with large gourmet kitchen with eating area, formal dining room, fireplace plus 5 sets of french doors.Book early so you don't miss out on this fantastic setting. Call for availability during holidays & prices can vary depending on dates and number of occupants.
featured_prop.Rooms: Dining Room,Entry,Formal Entry,Great Room,Guest Room,Living Room,Utility Room,Walk In Pantry

featured_prop.Directions: Enter Legends gate from Madison. Past gate, turn left to Golf View Drive. Home on right hand side.
featured_prop.Remarks: Extraordinary Entertainer's Dream Home! Beautifully situated on a premier south facing location on the 12th hole of the Jack Nicklaus Tournament with panoramic coveted Santa Rosa Mountain views! This desert resort home features approx 2818 sq ft, 4bdrms, 4.5 baths including a private detached casita with many amenities including professional chef's kitchen upgrades with stainless Wolf range & double oven, Sub Zero refrigerator & Bosch dishwasher, upgraded cabinets in cherry wood, apron front sink & custom hood in kitchen, built-ins throughout, travertine flooring, granite enhanced master bath, and more. This great room floorplan with walls of glass provides the perfect synergy of indoor/outdoor living space. Enjoy the veranda covered outdoor patio allowing lots of room for entertaining. The sparkling pebble tec salt water pool/spa enhances a spectacular courtyard entry providing privacy for outside entertaining by the pool.

featured_prop.Directions: Enter front gate on Country Club go toward club house. Turn onto White Horse and proceed to the right. South facing property located on the north loop of White Horse Trail
featured_prop.Features: Barbecue Private,Energy Efficient,Misting System,Solar System Owned
featured_prop.Remarks: Available for the 2017 season. Tenant can use landlords golf membership. Largest newly remodeled 4 bedroom 4.5 bath south facing property available at Indian Ridge with a new expanded great room. Gourmet kitchen features a 14 foot granite center island with top of the line appliances-dual wolf convection ovens, wolf professional range, warming drawer & microwave, 2 dishwashers (Bosch & Fisher-Paykel) 2 pull out refrigerator drawers, full sized wine refrigerator, stainless farm sink & prep sink. New 36X18 porcelain tile flooring throughout, artisan fireplace, new motorized solar shades, owned solar system, professional mist system, 4 electronic awnings, stone patios, paver driveway & desert landscaping. The large great room is perfect for entertaining but cozy enough for watching TV or enjoying the huge patio overlooking the Grove 13 golf hole. Guests will love the privacy of the private detached casita with french doors. King, Cal King, Queen in casita and office with sofa bed

featured_prop.Directions: Main Gate all the way to back gate. Turn right on Gold Canyon.
featured_prop.Remarks: LEASED Jan-April 2016. Over the top POOL/SPA home! Large fenced yard allows for great sun on pool! Updated and Contemporary flair with timeless taste! Located high above Arroyo # 9, the lake and mountain views are stunning! New, New, New. Pavered entry/driveway, desertscaping & outdoor lighting...kitchen cabinet fronts and pull out drawers, high-end stainless steel appliances, stacked stone backsplash, tile flooring, stone fireplace...ALL new furniture, toilets, faucets, framed bath mirrors. The upgrades are amazing! The window coverings are Silhouettes & there are crisp shutters in the bedrooms. The hall armoire is built-in for great storage. The walk-in closet in master has been custom fit so there is no unused space! You'll find gorgeous updated lighting with dimmers throughout. This is the popular great room floor plan with great separation of bedrooms and the large great room with built-in bar, kitchen, dining and living space in one. See Attached docs for Upgrade list.

featured_prop.Directions: South on Madison Street turn into Greg Norman gate. House is on right hand side.
featured_prop.Remarks: The Most Spectacular Views! Lake, Southern Mountain and Greg Norman golf course views make this location so special and private. Enjoy desert living in this Santa Rosa Plan featuring approx. 3,800 sq ft, 3bdrms, 3.5baths, plus den and an office providing the perfect set up for entertaining with a true chef's granite island kitchen w/breakfast nook, family room off kitchen, granite wet bar, Travertine floors, master suite w/ marble bath with gorgeous views, and more. Resort backyard perfect for entertaining with pool/spa and built-in BBQ, firepit and estate size lot. Enjoy sun all day long by the dramatic infinity salt water pool/spa with forever views.

featured_prop.Directions: From main gate continue on Indian Ridge Drive. Turn right on Tomahawk and turn left on first street - Dove Run Circle
featured_prop.Remarks: Leased December 2016 - April 2017. The lucky tenant can upgrade the owners club membership to golf and have full golf privileges for the term of the lease. Decorator high end property with private pool & spa privately located in the large courtyard with south sun. Golf course patio faces west with panoramic mountain views. Located on a private cul-de-sac located by the golf practice area a cart ride from the clubhouse and activities. Never have you seen a luxurious rental available with all new surfaces, flooring, window coverings, furnished and complete with decorator accessories and ready for your enjoyment. Bougainvillea 2 floor plan with great room and wet bar. Available during the season or off season. 3 bedrooms (king, queen and 2 twins) all with private baths and walk-in closets in master bedroom. This is a one of a kind lease at prestigious Indian Ridge Country Club. Be the privileged one to live this lifestyle in this spectacular property.
featured_prop.Rooms: Dining Room,Entry,Family Room,Formal Entry,Great Room,Guest Room,Living Room,Utility Room

featured_prop.Directions: From main gate on Country Club, turn left on Red Arrow after guard and go to almost the end of Red Arrow Trail.
featured_prop.Remarks: Leased January - March 2017. Tenant may use the owners country club membership and update to golf! SOUTH facing with views of the golf course, green, lakes, streams and spectacular mountain views. Spacious 3102 square foot home with good separation of bedrooms for maximum privacy. 3 sleeping bedrooms with a king in master and queens in 2 guest bedrooms all with private full baths. Large gourmet kitchen with large center island that opens to the family room with golf course views. Wet bar and dining room are adjoining the living room with double sliders that open the the golf course patio with custom BBQ area and fire pit. Enjoy some of the best south facing views on the 6th hole of the Grove course. Conveniently located close to a community pool and spa on a quiet interior street. Indian Ridge can upgrade the club membership to golf. Centrally located close to all dining and shopping on El Paseo.

featured_prop.Directions: Main gate down Indian Ridge Drive to Mesa Grande...Go Right, will be on your right.
featured_prop.MiscString4: Mountain View,Pool View,Golf Course View,Lake View
featured_prop.Remarks: LEASED Jan-March 2016. Casa Palmeras ~ Stunning elevated views over the lake on Arroyo # 2. This is your perfect winter home within the prestigious guard gated Indian Ridge Country Club. Fantastic Bougainvillea 1 model with PRIVATE POOL/SPA. Large great room with ceramic tile and great built-ins. Seating at wet bar and at long kitchen counter. Great floorplan for entertaining. All three bedrooms feature their own private bath. Master bedroom looks over fairway and lake. Wireless internet and TVs in bedrooms...this home is well appointed. Sleeps six. Small dog considered. Owner has IRCC Club Membership...Seasonal membership options are available for tenant.
featured_prop.ViewDescription: Golf Course View,Lake View,Mountain View,Pool View

featured_prop.Directions: Indian Ridge main gate to Tomahawk Drive. Turn right on Tomahawk, turn left on Mesa Grande Drive...home will be on your right.
featured_prop.Remarks: AVAILABLE Dec 2015-February 2016. LEASED March-May 2016. CASA MESA GRANDE...High above Grove #16! Professionally decorated Bougainvillea 2 Spa home with fantastic views! East and south views! The outdoor entertaining yard is fenced, has an awning and a private SPA. Centrally located on an interior street, the courtyard is oversized and perfectly landscaped. Inside you'll find a sophisticated yet warm home with great attention to detail. Luxurious master has a king bed, the guest room has a queen bed, the office has a full pull-out. Club or Golf Membership is available - Call for details.

featured_prop.Directions: Through front gate on Country Club Drive. Go straight and turn right on Tomahawk Drive
featured_prop.Remarks: Fabulous luxury Tuscan lease at Indian Ridge Country Club. The newly landscaped courtyard with tiered fountain invites to you enter this special property. Enjoy the winter months with the west facing sun filled pool with cascading waterfall and spa and built-in BBQ with the golf course and San Jacinto mountains beyond. If you prefer shade there are 2 electronic awnings that can cover the patio & pool. The interior has custom wood trim, crown molding, paneling and built-ins throughout with travertine flooring with inlaid stone design. The master suite has a king bed & convenient office area. The 2 guest room suites - one is a king & the other guest suite has two full sized beds providing wonderful sleeping quarter for guests. The garage is air conditioned with epoxy floors & a golf cart is included. Please book early for this one of a kind luxury lease.
featured_prop.Rooms: Dining Room,Family Room,Formal Entry,Great Room,Office,Utility Room,Walk In Pantry

featured_prop.Directions: Enter at main gate on Country Club Drive. After guard continue straight on Indian Ridge Drive. Turn left on Hawk Hill Trail. Property is on right side of street.
featured_prop.Remarks: Leased Jan - April 14, 2016. Tenant can use landlords golf and sport club membership for $250 per month with paying no dues. Fabulous south winter sun from a large private patio overlooking streams & lakes with mountain views. Enjoy private spa with rock water wall and dipping pool with custom BBQ area. Bougainvillea 1 open floor plan with 3 bedrooms & 3.5 baths with 2430 square feet. Master is a king & guest rooms are queens. No cost long distance calling to US and Canada with wireless internet included. Close to clubhouse activities & golf privileges are available to tenants.

featured_prop.Directions: Enter at main gate on Country Club Drive. After guard, turn lelf on Red Arrow. Turn right on Desert Holly. Located mid-block 2 doors from a community pool.
featured_prop.Remarks: AVAILABLE for the season with a full golf membership at $7,500/month or $3400/month for a 12 long term lease including golf privileges. Located on the 4th hole of the Grove course with water & mountain views. Great interior location only 2 doors from a community pool & spa. This 3 bedroom, two bath, 1,903 square foot home is designed with a casual open floor plan with views of the golf course. Tastefully turnkey furnished in soft tones, ceramic flooring with the kitchen open to the great room featuring a fireplace and an inviting patio with fabulous views. This home is offered turnkey furnished so you can just move in and enjoy the desert lifestyle. Indian Ridge Country Club is a centrally located private club with two Arnold Palmer Championship courses, 14 tennis courts (two clay) and an active social program with a myriad of social activities. Close to all El Paseo restaurants & shopping. Properties with a full golf membership are rare. Call to book seasonal

featured_prop.Directions: Through front gate. Continue down Indian Ridge Drive. Turn right on Tomahawk.
featured_prop.Remarks: Taking reservations for the 2017 season. Leased Nov 15 2015 to April 15 2016. Tenants can use owners sport club membership or upgrade to a golf membership with full privileges for the season. Rare west facing turnkey furnished bougainvillea 1 on the 16th hole of the Grove course. Popular great room floor plan with an open kitchen featuring views of the snow capped mountains & golf course. Large patio also two retractable awnings and the master bedroom is located on the fairway side of the property. Enjoy the large gourmet kitchen, separate wet bar. 3 bedrooms 3.5 baths with 2430 square feet of living space. Up-to-date 55 inch TV in great room & each bedroom has a 45 inch TV. Enjoy the Indian Ridge lifestyle at this rare seasonal rental. Master has king bed and the guest bedroom are queens. One bedroom has a desk area for a computer and workspace. Submit for small pets.

featured_prop.Directions: Enter Indian Ridge through main guard gate. Continue down Indian Ridge Drive. Turn left on Hawk Hill Trail. Take Hawk Hill to the left and continue to property on left hand side of street.
featured_prop.Remarks: Taking reservations for the 2017 season. Leased Jan - March 2016. Beautiful Bougainvillea 1 ready for seasonal lease. Tenant can upgrade owners social membership to club or golf membership as per club rules. Offered fully furnished and ready for the season. 3 bedroom 3.5 bath popular open floor plan with wet bar, large gourmet open kitchen, shutters and tile floors. Setup as 3 bedrooms - master with king, guest bedrooms queen and 2 twins plus office area. Located on a quiet interior street at prestigious Indian Ridge Country Club centrally located close to El Paseo shopping and gourmet restaurants.

featured_prop.Directions: Enter gate on Country Club Drive. After guard gate go straight on Indian Ridge Drive. Turn left on Hawk Hill. Turn right on Hawk Hill Trail. Property is on right side of street. No sign.
featured_prop.Remarks: Taking reservations for 2017 season. Leased December-February 2016. Tenants can be approved to use owners sport club membership or upgrade to a golf membership with full privileges. West facing with south and west views from the 14th hole of the Arroyo course. Open floor plan with comfortable great room floor plan with formal dining, wet bar and double slider doors to the wide golf course patio with electronic awnings. New travertine flooring & 2 new flat screen TVs. Master with king bed, walk-in closets and luxurious master bath is adjacent to the golf course patio. Two guest suites and private baths are on opposite sides of the property for privacy. One with a twin bed with trundle to sleep 2 plus a desk area and the other with a queen bed This is a well appointed home that is immaculate.

featured_prop.Directions: Ave 48 to South on Madison. Montage at Santa Rosa West Gate. Enter and make first right turn. Home on the left side.
featured_prop.Remarks: Only available short term and music festivals. Beautiful Montage at Santa Rosa Home available for Coachella and Stagecoach rentals. Walk or bike to the Polo fields. 4 bedrooms, 3.5 Baths. Beautiful sparkling pool and grassy backyard is the perfect setting for enjoying the music festivals. NOT OFFERED LONG TERM.

featured_prop.Directions: South on PGA Blvd to Weiskopf gate. Spanish Bay, house on left.
featured_prop.Remarks: Fabulous Desert Retreat with stunning lake, mountain & fairway views on the 18th fairway of the Nicklaus Tournament Course. This Spanish Bay Quevedo plan features approx 3,285 sq. ft. w/ 3 BD/3.5 BA including a private 2 room separate casita. Open and spacious Great Room with entertaining in mind, upgraded Floors, Chef's granite island kitchen w/ stainless appliances, and a living room with pocket doors that open up to the private pool and spa. Other amenities include a family room with built ins, double facing fireplace in the master suite, built in entertainment center, and a private gated courtyard.

featured_prop.Directions: Go through front gate on Country Club Drive. After guard turn left on Red Arrow, turn left on Desert Holly rive and right on Red Arrow Trail.
featured_prop.Remarks: Leased from October 23 2015 to May 15 2016. Tenant can us owners club membership or upgrade to golf. Available as a SOUTH FACING seasonal lease. Remodeled from travertine flooring with crown molding, new kitchen with large granite center island, new stainless appliances, travertine bathrooms with new showers & counters, extended patio complete with electronic awnings. Property has a king in the master, queen and 2 twins. Conveniently located one building from a community pool and spa. Call for availability and off season rates. Indian Ridge is an upscale address close to El Paseo shopping, restaurants and close to golf venues. Make this your desert getaway. Landlord wants a minimum of 4 -5 months.
